content:
A new shower head can make a big difference in your showering experience.

When it comes to shower heads that are easy to clean and resistant to clogs, here are some features to look for:

1. **Removable and cleanable nozzles**: Look for shower heads with nozzles that can be removed and cleaned or replaced. This will allow you to remove any mineral buildup or debris that can cause clogs.
2. **Anti-clog designs**: Some shower heads have anti-clog designs, such as holes or channels that help to prevent mineral buildup and debris from accumulating.
3. **Water-saving designs**: Low-flow shower heads can be more prone to clogging, but some models are designed to maintain water pressure while still being water-efficient.

Here are a few shower head recommendations that fit these criteria:

1. **Delta Faucet 7-Spray Touch-Clean Shower Head**: This shower head has removable nozzles that can be cleaned with a simple touch, and it's designed to resist mineral buildup.
2. **Moen Engage 6-Function Shower Head**: This shower head has a unique design that allows for easy cleaning and is resistant to clogging. It also has multiple spray settings for a great showering experience.
3. **Waterpik Shower Head**: Waterpik is a well-known brand that offers a range of shower heads with anti-clog designs and removable nozzles. Their shower heads are also known for their powerful water pressure.

When shopping for a new shower head, be sure to read reviews and look for products with good ratings and warranties.

And yay for your new shampoo! It's great to hear that it's making your hair feel soft and silky. Enjoy your new shower head and your great hair days!
